## interface_CollapseConfig
Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts:23](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts#L23)

Configuration options for the collapse transition.

### Properties

#### animationPendingClasses?

> `optional` **animationPendingClasses**: `string`[]

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts:39](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts#L39)

the list of classes to add to the collapsable element while transitioning

***

#### dimension?

> `optional` **dimension**: `"height"` \| `"width"`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts:27](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts#L27)

the direction in which the collapsing is performed

***

#### hideClasses?

> `optional` **hideClasses**: `string`[]

the list of classes to add to the collapsable element when collapsed

***

#### showClasses?

> `optional` **showClasses**: `string`[]

the list of classes to add to the collapsable element when shown

## interface_CollapseContext

Represents the context for a collapsible element.

### Properties

#### maxSize?

> `optional` **maxSize**: `string`

the maximum size of the collapseable content.

***

#### minSize?

## function_collapseHorizontalTransition
> **collapseHorizontalTransition**(`element`, `direction`, `animated`, `signal`, `context`): `void` \| [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts:31](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core-bootstrap/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts#L31)

A transition function for collapsing elements horizontally.

This function is created using the `createCollapseTransition` utility
and is configured with `horizontalConfig`.

### Parameters

#### element

[`SSRHTMLElement`](../../types#ssrhtmlelement)

Element on which the transition should be applied.

#### direction

Whether the element should be shown or hidden.

`"show"` | `"hide"`

#### animated

`boolean`

Whether the transition should be animated.

#### signal

[`AbortSignal`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/AbortSignal)

Signal allowing to stop the transition while running.

#### context

`object`

Context of the current transition. It is reused between calls if the previous transition was stopped while running on the same element.

### Returns

`void` \| [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

## function_collapseVerticalTransition
> **collapseVerticalTransition**(`element`, `direction`, `animated`, `signal`, `context`): `void` \| [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

Defined in: [core-bootstrap/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts:24](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core-bootstrap/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts#L24)

A transition function that handles vertical collapse animations.

This function is created using the `createCollapseTransition` utility with
a vertical configuration. It is intended to be used for animating the
collapsing and expanding of vertical elements.

### Parameters

#### element

[`SSRHTMLElement`](../../types#ssrhtmlelement)

Element on which the transition should be applied.

#### direction

Whether the element should be shown or hidden.

`"show"` | `"hide"`

#### animated

`boolean`

Whether the transition should be animated.

#### signal

[`AbortSignal`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/AbortSignal)

Signal allowing to stop the transition while running.

#### context

`object`

Context of the current transition. It is reused between calls if the previous transition was stopped while running on the same element.

### Returns

`void` \| [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

## function_createCollapseTransition
> **createCollapseTransition**(`config`): [`TransitionFn`](../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts:55](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/services/transitions/collapse.ts#L55)

Create a collapse transition.

The transition attaches / removes classes during the different states of the collapse transition.
It also updates the dimension value when reaching a non-pending state.

### Parameters

#### config

[`CollapseConfig`](#collapseconfig) = `{}`

the collapse config

### Returns

[`TransitionFn`](../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

the collapse transition
